name: ColorBlastTree
0:

”Alexa, tell color blast tree red”

Developer Terms of Use
des: Learn how to voice-activate Polygroup® Color Blast Trees & Smart Lights, our latest smart tree series that talks to Amazon Alexa for a completely hands-free product control experience.
